name: Pandemic Dash
description:
The world is plagued by a new virus. 

Your family are starving. 

You must go to the shops...

Dash around a supermarket while collecting the items on your shopping list. Avoid getting within two metres of other shoppers, and get out in time to feed your family.

Controls: 

W.A.S.D - movement

Press/Release Left Mouse Button - pick up/ drop /interact

Space bar - Grab/let go of your trolley

Left Shift - Trolley Brake

Scroll Wheel - Zoom camera

Find the items on your list and get out as quickly as you can without exposing yourself to other shoppers.

This game was made in one week for the #SideQuest #5 game jam.

Credits:

James Moyse - Designer and Programmer
Robert Doman - Artist and Level Designer
